categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic squads

nodes.text: The Buzz Boys were a team of eight mercenaries working with the Alliance to Restore the Republic. They were one of the Alliance teams sent to retrieve an Imperial I2-CG droid that had ejected from a Tech 4 PDV over the planet Goratak III. They were each armed with a blaster rifle and a vibroblade, and the squad carried a tripod-mounted repeating blaster.
